text: The Tonga women's national football team represents Tonga in international women's football. The team is controlled by the Tonga Football Association. Their best title was Third in the 2007 OFC Women's Championship. ==World Cup record== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year !Result !Matches !Wins !Draws !Losses !GF !GA |- | 1991 |colspan=8|Did Not Enter |- | 1995 |colspan=8|Did Not Enter |- | 1999 |colspan=8|Did Not Enter |- | 2003 |colspan=8|Did Not Enter |- | 2007 |colspan=8|Did Not Qualify |- | 2011 |colspan=8|Did Not Qualify |- | 2015 |colspan=8|Did Not Qualify |- | 2019 |colspan=8|Did Not Qualify |- | 2023 |colspan=8|To Be Determined |- |Total||0/9||0||0||0||0||0||0 |} ==OFC Women's Championship== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; width:50%;" |- !colspan=10|Oceania Women's Cup |- !Year !Result !GP !W !D* !L !GF !GA !GD |- |- | 1983||Did Not Enter||-||-||-||-||-||-||- |- | 1986||Did Not Enter||-||-||-||-||-||-||- |- | 1989||Did Not Enter||-||-||-||-||-||-||- |- | 1991||Did Not Enter||-||-||-||-||-||-||- |- | 1994||Did Not Enter||-||-||-||-||-||-||- |- | 1998||Did Not Enter||-||-||-||-||-||-||- |- | 2003||Did Not Enter||-||-||-||-||-||-||- |-bgcolor=cfaa88 | 2007||Third Place||3||0||1||2||1||7||-6 |- | 2010||Group Stage||3||1||0||2||1||8||-7 |- | 2014||Fourth Place||3||0||1||2||1||20||-19 |- | 2018||Group Stage||3||1||0||2||1||23||-22 |- | 2022||colspan=8|To Be Determined |- |Total||3/10||12||2||2||8||4||58||-54 |} :*Draws include knockout matches decided on penalty kicks. ==Fixtures & Results== ===2018=== ===2019=== ==Current squad== The following players were called up for the 2019 Pacific Games from 8–20 July in Apia, Samoa. Caps and goals updated as of 18 July 2019, after the game against Fiji. ===Recent call-ups=== The following players have been called up for the team in the last 12 months. ==References== ==External links== *Official website *FIFA profile Category:Oceanian women's national association football teams women
